text: Vanessa Joy Lachey (n√©e Minnillo; born November 9, 1980) is an American television personality, fashion model, and actress. She was named Miss Teen USA in 1998. She has also been a correspondent for Entertainment Tonight from 2005 to 2007 and hosted Total Request Live on MTV. == Early life == Minnillo was born in Angeles, Pampanga, Philippines. Her mother is Filipino and her father is an American of Ashkenazi Jews, Irish and Italian ancestry. == Personal life == She married singer-songwriter Nick Lachey in 2011. Their son, Camden John Lachey, was born on September 12, 2012. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1980 births Category:Actors from South Carolina Category:Models from South Carolina Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Living people
title: Vanessa Minnillo
